create.description: Start new project from our examples

generate.description: Generate CRUD system, admin pages and GraphQL queries and mutations for Frontend
examples:
# To generate everything for all models in your schema
[31m>[39m [34mpal g[39m
[33mNote:[39m you need to change [34mUser,Post[39m with your schema models
# To generate everything for model or more 
[31m>[39m [34mpal g User,Post[39m
# To generate queries for one model or more 
[31m>[39m [34mpal g User,Post queries[39m
# To generate mutations for one model or more 
[31m>[39m [34mpal g User,Post mutations[39m
# To generate admin for one model or more 
[31m>[39m [34mpal g User,Post admin[39m
# To generate graphql for one model or more 
[31m>[39m [34mpal g User,Post graphql[39m
# To generate queries and mutations for one model or more 
[31m>[39m [34mpal g User,Post crud[39m

config.name: config
config.description: You can pass custom config file name

schema.name: schema
schema.description: You can pass custom schema file path

args.name: models
args.description: schema model name to generate files for. You can pass one or more models like User,Post

args.name: type
args.description: Type of files to generate you can send one or more like queries,mutations

schema.description: Prisma schema file converter to: 1- json object. 2- change Snack case to Camel case. 3- TypeScript type definitions.

type.name: type
type.description: type of output file type when you convert to json

schema.name: schema
schema.description: You can pass custom schema file path

args.name: converter
args.description: specify what is the function you need
